topic: How to design notebooks to production using fastapi with Python 3.12+
prompt: Write a Python 3.12+ focused, accurate explainer for: How to design notebooks to production using fastapi with Python 3.12+

response_parsed.title: Designing Notebooks for Production with FastAPI in Python 3.12+
response_parsed.summary: This guide explains how to transition Jupyter notebooks into production-ready applications using the FastAPI framework in Python 3.12+. It covers key points, code examples, version notes, and caveats.
key_points: Converting Jupyter notebooks to FastAPI web apps
Implementing best practices for production-ready code
Utilizing Python 3.12+ features in FastAPI development
version_notes: Python 3.12.x features like improved type hints and f-strings enhance FastAPI development.
FastAPI version notes can be found on the official FastAPI documentation.
caveats: Ensure to handle exceptions appropriately in production
Test your application thoroughly before deploying
